The last SCSS Framework you will ever need!

Download Check on GitHub
Start using Fajny CSS

Install Fajny in your project

Via CDN

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/fajny-css/css/fajny.min.css" type="text/css" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/fajny-css-icons/css/fajny-icons.min.css" type="text/css" />

Locally

<link rel="stylesheet" href="path/to/css/fajny.min.css" type="text/css" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="path/to/css/fajny-icons.min.css" type="text/css" />

Why choosing Fajny CSS?

Built with SCSS

This Framework is entirely built in SCSS, to ease the development!

Learn More about SCSS

Compile with Grunt

Don't bother to compile everytime SCSS, Grunt does it automatically!

Learn More about Grunt

Copy Figma file

You can also use Fajny CSS in your mockups, just download the Figma file and use it as library!

Download file

Totally Free

You can use everything for free, without having to credit us!

Start using Fajny CSS

Fully responsive

You won't have to adapt all the components to the different screens, it's done already!

Start using Fajny CSS
